name: Seaside Runner
description:
Behind this spongy and coral universe, hides an abyssal monster... Make your way through the sea and bypass the several obstacles, if you want to escape from it !

Seaside runner is 2D mobile game (Android) taking place underwater.
You'll embody an aquatic creature and you'll have to swim as fast as possible.
Try to not be eaten and avoid obstacles on your way to survive longer !

Get best high scores to unlock new playable characters (2000 for the swordfish and 5000 for the pistol shrimp).

  • Tap on the left of the screen to jump / dive
  • Tap on the right of the screen to slice algae and fishes.


This game was developped by a team of 10 second year students from Créajeux.
